name: Evaluate Measure
description: The evaluateMeasure operation is used to invoke an eMeasure and obtain the results
comment: The effect of invoking this operation is to calculate the measure for the given patient, or all patients if no patient is supplied, and return the results as a MeasureReport resource of the appropriate type

parameter.name: periodStart
parameter.documentation: The start of the measurement period

parameter.name: periodEnd
parameter.documentation: The end of the measurement period

parameter.name: reportType
parameter.documentation: The type of measure report, patient, patient-list, or population

parameter.name: lastReceivedOn
parameter.documentation: The date the results of this measure were last received

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: The results of the measure calculation
